description: Deletes the association between configuration items and one or more tags. This API accepts a list of multiple configuration items.

parameters.name: configurationIds
parameters.description: A list of configuration items with tags that you want to delete. (string) ---

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags that you want to delete from one or more configuration items. Specify the tags that you want to delete in a key-value format. For example: {"key": "serverType", "value": "webServer"} (dict) --- Metadata that help you categorize IT assets. The type of tag on which to filter. A value for a tag key on which to filter.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The type of tag on which to filter.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: A value for a tag key on which to filter.
